title: Leafy Diamond Kada Bracelet - "Pallavi Bandi" (పల్లవి బండి)
materials: conflict-free Baguette and Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Expertly crafted with a delicate Hyderabadi polish to enhance the warm luster of the gold.
features: This enchanting bracelet features a central square motif adorned with Baguette cut diamonds, surrounded by pave set round brilliant diamonds. The band is composed of stylized leaf-shaped diamond clusters, meticulously designed for maximum brilliance and light reflection. The clasp is discreetly integrated into the design, ensuring a seamless and elegant look. Incorporates a modern take on traditional South Indian foliage motifs.
colors: Rose Gold (Gulabi Bangaram) and dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of sophisticated sparkle. Also suitable as a stunning gift for birthdays and anniversaries.
description: This exquisite Kada bracelet seamlessly blends contemporary design with timeless elegance. The unique leaf motif represents growth and prosperity, making it a meaningful and stylish addition to your jewelry collection. The Baguette and Round Brilliant diamonds offer unparalleled sparkle and brilliance, showcasing superior craftsmanship and attention to detail. This is a piece that will be treasured for generations.
